thread.title: Cosmic Girls Rises To Top Of Music Charts With “I Wish”
thread.title_full: Cosmic Girls Rises To Top Of Music Charts With “I Wish”

author: uing
title: Cosmic Girls Rises To Top Of Music Charts With “I Wish”
text:
Cosmic Girls is on a roll with their new song “I Wish.” 
On January 4 at 12 a.m. KST, Cosmic Girls released their third mini album, “From. WJSN.” For the first time since their debut, they ranked number one on a music chart. 
They rose to the top of various music charts, taking the number one and number three spots on Mnet and Olleh Music respectively. 
A source from Starship Entertainment expressed, “We thank everyone for helping Cosmic Girls do well on the charts among the fierce competition. They’ve returned as a whole with all 13 members, and we’ll do our best to show fans a hard-working and constantly improving Cosmic Girls.” 
Their title song “I Wish” is a bright dance song that highlights Cosmic Girls’s cheerful image. It immediately catches the listener’s attention with a melodious synthesizer sound and a rhythmical bass. It’s a must-listen that you should definitely check out, along with their trippy music video . 
Congratulations, Cosmic Girls!
